body_html:
Have same issue as kintaat on 0.4.1 and same issue as alizhang on master

I have this too, on the same version, will try to create another conda environment to check if the nightly build has this issue.

Nighlty reports this for the same code:
"RuntimeError: Cowardly refusing to serialize non-leaf tensor which requires_grad, since autograd does not support crossing process boundaries. If you just want to transfer the data, call detach() on the tensor before serializing (e.g., putting it on the queue)."

Much more understandable mesage, and funny too.
At least I can work around this now.

Much more understandable mesage, and funny too.
At least I can work around this now.
body:
> Have same issue as kintaat on 0.4.1 and same issue as alizhang on master

I have this too, on the same version, will try to create another conda environment to check if the nightly build has this issue.

Nighlty reports this for the same code:
"RuntimeError: Cowardly refusing to serialize non-leaf tensor which requires_grad, since autograd does not support crossing process boundaries.  If you just want to transfer the data, call detach() on the tensor before serializing (e.g., putting it on the queue)."

Much more understandable mesage, and funny too. 
At least I can work around this now.
